quiz.question: Which phobia is fear of clowns often associated with in popular culture?

Which phobia describes fear of opera or theatrical performances in some individuals?

Which popular humorous phobia was created to critique irrational fears of long words?

Which phobia name literally uses the Greek word for fear, 'phobos'?
Which unusual phobia is the fear of peanut butter sticking to the roof of the mouth?
Which phobia coined in 2008 highlighted anxieties tied to modern mobile connectivity?
What is coulrophobia commonly defined as?

Which phobia is documented as fear of swallowing pills or tablets in clinical reports?
